attributes.action: Stop taxing Private Vehicles until we have a safe and sustainable Public service
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Stop taxes on Private vehicles, until we get a safe and sustainable Public service, where everyone has a seat, and feels safe.
We need safer trains, buses and all forms of transport.

rejection.details:
There are several petitions already on this issue. http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=transport
Please consider signing one of those, rather than creating another one.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
